JobFullDesc: Recruiting is a core strategic driver of Facebook's success. Key to that success is our ability to interview and hire top talent in a way that supports diversity, keeps our hiring partners engaged, and creates a superior experience for our candidates. To do that, we’re looking for an Interview Experience Program Designer to build scalable systems and processes to support how we interview and assess candidates. Programs could include: the lifecycle of interview questions (creation, review, monitoring, sunsetting), interviewer certification (how should interviewers be trained, how will we recognize interviewers), and post-interview candidate reviews (how hiring decisions are made, who makes those decisions, what data is used). This is a new role on a new and growing team that will chart the future of interviewing and evaluating candidates at scale for Facebook.The ideal candidate has experience working at the intersection of people, strategy, and scaled program design. This role requires a self-starter who proactively identifies problems and opportunities, pulls together the data and people to develop solutions, and then designs and drives the implementation of systems and programs across an organization of thousands by leaning on change management and an ability to influence. This person must be a system-level thinker and expert program designer for large, complex programs/processes. The person in this role will manage across our recruiting leadership team, our research functions, our recruiting product teams, and our hiring partners to streamline and enhance how we interview and hire top talent.
